root.name: Super Bases Loaded 2
root.description: OverviewSuper Bases Loaded 2 is the sixth game in Jaleco's Bases Loaded series of baseball sims, and the second for the Super Nintendo. Unlike Super Bases Loaded, which was based on the first Super Professional Baseball, this game is instead based on a separate Jaleco baseball game Super 3D Baseball - a baseball sim that experiments with a 3D viewpoint, made possible with the Super Nintendo's Mode 7 graphics and a special DSP chip included in the cart. Jaleco's Super Professional Baseball II, the sequel to the first Super Bases Loaded, did not receive a US counterpart.As with previous Bases Loaded games, the team names and logos are fictionalized but use actual American cities involved in MLB.
